datatypeProperties.comment: Does the standard promote access and selection of inputs and varieties (traditional versus improved/engineered)
Standard explicitly includes information on applicants’ access to finance/credit to the applicant, and the standard organization has a role to play
Does the standard promote access to technology and innovation
Standard addresses issues related to advance payments including pre-financing
Does the standard system requier the development and implementation of policies that encourage clients, staff and suppliers to consider sustainability issues
Does the standard include criteria on clear policies and fair process for subcontracting
Standard includes criteria related to other market access issues not included in previous list
Does the standard include criteria related to policies and rules for marketing materials used by the assessee (quality/accuracy of the marketing materials)
Does the standard system encourage the formation of different types of organization and management (for example cooperatives
Does the standard require price premiums to be paid to producers
Does the standard's requirements for rights and benefits for workers also apply to input suppliers?
Does the standard require appropriate conditions (temperature, maintenance, servicing) in infrastructure (transport, storage, testing laboratories)
Does the standard system encourage lending practices that promote local entities
Does the standard include criteria related to local micro businesses/incubation/facilitation
Standard includes requirements related to recording market information and sharing it with the standard system
Does the standard addresses issues relating to minimum price guarantees
Does the standard include criteria related to measures of customers satisfaction
Standard includes criteria related to promote or put in place non-discriminatory lending practices
Does the standard promote (responsible) intensification / expansion of cultivation or infrastructures
Does the standard require written contracts with traders to be issued
Does the standard include criteria on establishing specific delivery times for suppliers and processes for late delivery?
Does the standard include criteria for the production processes beyond primary production?
Criteria providing a framework to reinforce the links between supply chain actors and making it more robust (e.g. via contracts and responsibilities sharing…)
Does the standard address issues relating to traceability of inputs / varieties and records of materials used
